r.s: Fast and Safe little cache system
r.d: This package is a little cache system optimized for file containers. It is fast and safe (because it uses file locking and/or anti-corruption tests).
r.n: New features : - a new phpt test script (eternal caching) - you can now call Cache_Lite constructor with any argument (thanks to ratibus at gmail dot com) Bug fixed : - bugfixes about eternal caching Other change : - better code factoring (thanks to ratibus at gmail dot com)
